channel.title: CVE Feed for IDM Sistemas QSige -- QSige
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IDM Sistemas QSige -- QSige

item.title: CVE-2023-4102|2023-10-03T11:29:46.537Z -- idm%20sistemas%20qsige -- qsige
item.description: QSige login SSO does not have an access control mechanism to verify whether the user requesting a resource has sufficient permissions to do so. As a prerequisite, it is necessary to log into the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-4103|2023-10-03T11:30:45.879Z -- idm%20sistemas%20qsige -- qsige
item.description: QSige statistics are affected by a remote SQLi vulnerability. It has been identified that the web application does not correctly filter input parameters, allowing SQL injections, DoS or information disclosure. As a prerequisite, it is necessary to log into the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-4097|2023-10-03T11:07:56.121Z -- idm%20sistemas%20qsige -- qsige
item.description: The file upload functionality is not implemented correctly and allows uploading of any type of file. As a prerequisite, it is necessary for the attacker to log into the application with a valid username.

item.title: CVE-2023-4100|2023-10-03T11:22:28.091Z -- idm%20sistemas%20qsige -- qsige
item.description: Allows an attacker to perform XSS attacks stored on certain resources. Exploiting this vulnerability can lead to a DoS condition, among other actions.

item.title: CVE-2023-4101|2023-10-03T11:26:49.190Z -- idm%20sistemas%20qsige -- qsige
item.description: The QSige login SSO does not have an access control mechanism to verify whether the user requesting a resource has sufficient permissions to do so. As a prerequisite, it is necessary to log into the application.
